artist: Artist: Kobayashi Toshimitsu; Publisher: Fukuda Kumajirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; underwater battle with divers fighting at left and two figures in underwater scuba apparatuses fighting at center, with fallen fighter left of central pair; figure holding light underwater at right; boats on water surface with red light; sheets affixed together
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Extra Issue of September 20th, Great Naval Battle off the Yalu River
